column4: mcopple.. yea, i mean ideally i agree with you, but MS reings now and can't ignore that
i mean, even the nerds have problems with compatibility, my case is example

-- interoperability like that is something that will probably have tobe left up to paid consultants, it isn't something most community folks would do. I would just use SAMBA and mount the ext3 drives as CIFS shares.
